DOC.brief_summary: This trial is trying to understand if immobilization of the thumb after a non-displaced scaphoid fracture affects recovery. The standard of care overseas is a cast that allows for free movement of the thumb, and in the United States it is a cast that immobilizes the thumb. This study is attempting to understand if there is a difference.
DOC.brief_title: Cast Immobilization for Non-Displaced Scaphoid Fractures
DOC.criteria: 1. 18 years or older 2. Isolated fracture of the scaphoid 3. No displacement of the scaphoid fracture on CT scan 1. Associated ipsilateral ligament injury or fracture 2. Pregnant Patient
